trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bartlesville
There were no other sightings in Bartlesville on or around November 30th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking a walk in a local park during the first week of December 2003 atabout 6pm when I looked up at the sky. I saw Venus in the W SW and Mars was S ofme. I looked toward my right and saw what I thought was another very bright,white colored planet. I was curious and gazed at it when a light cloud came infront of it and partially obscured the light. I stood and waited for the cloudto pass but when it did the light was gone. Im sure there is a naturalexplaination for this but I dont know what it would be. It was stationary whileI was gazing at it and it could be that I mistook its fading out behind thelight cloud for the light actually travelling away from me. I was calm theentire time and very curious. I was never frightened or nervous but a littleannoyed that I lost sight of it before I could identify what it was.
